245b5(mdo 'grel): slong gi dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyir rung ngo // de'i 'og tu dge tshul rnams la dgag dbye bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams la'o// dge slong bzhi man chad kyis ni byin gyis brlabs par bya'o//

245b7(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun tshogs pa de'i tshe bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bya'o// lan gsum du bzlas/ dgag dbye'i gzhi'o// / 
245b8(mdo 'grel): bam po brgyad pa/ sra rkyang gi gzhi'i sdom la/ sra brkyang gding bar byed pa dang // 'dir dang go byed 'byin pa'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'di na dbyar 
246a1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis gos kyi rnyed pa'i chos gos bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang 
246a2(mdo 'grel): bar mdzod cig dang / 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du chos 
246a3(mdo 'grel): gos sra brkyang du bgyis te/ gnas gang du sra brkyang btang bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral nagasar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams 
246a4(mdo 'grel): gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa'i chos gos bgyis pa 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du bzhes pas/ de'i slad du 'di lta ste gnas bsdub dang 
246a5(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyis te/ gnas gang du 
246a6(mdo 'grel): sa brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar ba rnams dang lta ci smos te/ chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag 
246a7(mdo 'grel): mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra bcung du bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// 
246a8(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding bar spo'am/ spo'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 
246b1(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar smon/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi 
246b2(mdo 'grel): sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ dge slong sra brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyung ngo // 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di 
246b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spor/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis meng 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'ding bar bko/ 
246b4(mdo 'grel): dge slong sra brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur na/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 
246b5(mdo 'grel): 'dir bar brko bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 
246b6(mdo 'grel): mang 'di zhes brtsi ba sngags dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'ding bangar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin// / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol 
246b7(mdo 'grel): chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags/ dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'don sra btung 'ding bar bskos lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la ba ba 
246b8(mdo 'grel): cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / 'di lta ste gnas bsrub dang / dge slong rnams bdeb la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sman pa po rnams kyi sbyin par 
247a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtod cing / sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes 
247a2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba chos gos 'dis dbyer gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang dus bcang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci spos 
247a3(mdo 'grel): dgasas / dge napa rnams gas dugasas/ gas 'du dag na pas ba du bla bathun pa bzas pa lags/ bad de/ mang pa 'dags parnabs sa 
247a4(mdo 'grel): 'ding bar bskos lags te/ 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad 
247a5(mdo 'grel): du bdag sra brkyang 'dir ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyibs tshes gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bgyi'o// gnas gang du sra brkyang gding bar chos gos rnyeng pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na 
247a6(mdo 'grel): gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/ lan gsum du bzlas/ gnas brtan nam btsun pa'am tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags//

247b1(mdo 'grel): bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci glos/ lan gsum du bzlas/ legs par bting ngo // shin tu bting ngo // 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon gang yod pa de 
247b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi yin no// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus rdzogs te/ gal te 
247b3(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du

247b5(mdo 'grel): dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing 
247b6(mdo 'grel): gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang byung lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun 
247b7(mdo 'grel): kyigyis sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags na gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i 
247b8(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams la brten te dge 'dun sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slob gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 
248a1(mdo 'grel): bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags te/ de'i slad du chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin par 
248a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad de/ chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 
248a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sa 
248a4(mdo 'grel): btung phyur lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// sra brkyang gi gzhi'o// gos kyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gos kyi gni'i sdom la/ shi dang nor 'dra snod 'gyed dang 
248a5(mdo 'grel): bcu gsum dang ni rung bya ba// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang /

248a7(mdo 'grel): gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge sbyong gre sdes gum par gyur na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis 
248a8(mdo 'grel): gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong kun dga' bo nor dang 'dra bas dge slong gre skyes gum pa'i rdzas bgo bar bgyi ba gum pa'i yo byad chos gos dang chos gos ma lags 
248b1(mdo 'grel): pa gda' ba dang mi gda' ba byin gyis brlab bo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// gos kyi gzhi'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par spro'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun

248b6(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsu nig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge

249a1(mdo 'grel): gos dang / zang gos dang / sham thabs dang / sham thabs kyi gzan dang / rdul gzan dang / rdul gzan gyi gzan dang / gdong phyis dang / nag gzan dang 
249a2(mdo 'grel): g.yan pa dgab pa dang skra bzed dang / gding ba dang / dbyar gyi gos ras chen la yang brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ gos 'di bdag dang grogs tshangs pa mtshungs par 
249a3(mdo 'grel): spyod pa la mkho ba'i yo byad kyis gos su byin gyis brlab bo// lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no// legs so// tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i 
249a4(mdo 'grel): chos gos lhag pa rung bar ma bgyis par 'os pa 'di mkhan po la rung bar bgyi'o// mkhan po la yid brtan te bcang bar bgyi'o// rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o// lan gsum du 
249a5(mdo 'grel): bzlas/ thabs yin no// legs so// gos kyi gzhi dang / nye ba'i gos kyi gzhi'o// sman gyi gzhi dang las kyi gzhi'i sdom la/ sman dang rung ba'i khang pa dang / 'dun pa'i gso

249a7(mdo 'grel): byin gyis brlab bo// lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no// legs so// zhag bdun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bdag la yang de bzhin do// dge slong lag gi blas rdo bte/ 
249a8(mdo 'grel): pan de'i dang por gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur ba'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o// dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis sems bsdu bas tshe dang 
249b1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dag ga ni 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur bar sems bsdus shig/ ces sems bsdu bar bya'o// dge slong ji snyed der phyin pa thams cad kyi gzhi 'dini dge 'dun gyi rung 
249b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i khang par 'gyur ba'o zhes tshig mthun pa cig car brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang mtshams/ 
249b3(mdo 'grel): dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bzhed ra/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang

250a1(mdo 'grel): 'am bgyis pa 'am lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung

250a3(mdo 'grel): nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga chung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am stobs dang ldan nam pa de'am kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam/ bde ba la reg par 
250a4(mdo 'grel): gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo// zla ba phyed byed cing gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gsol lo// 'dun pa dang gso sbyong bgyi bar gsol ba 'debs so// gsol ba yang mkhyen 
250a5(mdo 'grel): par gsol lo// las kyi gzhi'o// // phyir bcas pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ gleng dang nan tur bzod pa dang // mtho la dang spo ba rnams dang ni// mgu dang dbyung bar bya ba'o//

250a8(mdo 'grel): gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nabs sol gleng bar 
250b1(mdo 'grel): bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde ri la mchis nas dge slong 'gro mgyog sa dang nabs so

250b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dmar ser can 'di ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa
250b6(mdo 'grel): rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags te/ de dag dge slong rnams la rgyun du rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed pas des na dge 'dun lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang 
250b7(mdo 'grel): kha ton bgyi ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bgyi ba dang / nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi bshor na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig 
250b8(mdo 'grel): dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'azab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin pas mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gas na du 
251a1(mdo 'grel): gsol/ dge slong dmar ser can 'di ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/ 'tshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'byed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags/ 
251a2(mdo 'grel): te/ de dag dge slong rnams la rgyun tu rtsod pa'i gzhi ba byed pas/ des na dge 'dun lung ma nod pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton bgyi ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bgyi ba dang / nang du sems 
251a3(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas su bgyi bshor te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dmar 
251a4(mdo 'grel): ser can 'thab krol ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin// 
251a5(mdo 'grel): du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags 
251a6(mdo 'grel): te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong dmar ser can 'azab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar 
251a7(mdo 'grel): bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bdag dge slong 
251a8(mdo 'grel): dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin la sa mdzad lags pas sra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'byar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu skol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bapyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ 
251b1(mdo 'grel): mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing 'thab krol bgyid pa de yang spongad na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dud btsud pa bas kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag dge slong dpar ser can 
251b2(mdo 'grel): bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ la gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rda pas gsad du gsol/ dge slong dmar ser can 'di 'thab krol bgyid 
251b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'byed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyi pa lags pas 'thab krol bzod pa ma btang ba 'dal dge 'dun gyis bsdigs pas phrin 
251b4(mdo 'grel): las mdzad lags ste/ 'dib rdzogs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas sgra 'greng bar gyur/ rba 'phyar bar gyur cing / dge 'dun la spu rgol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs

251b7(mdo 'grel): rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dam ser can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 'thob krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa 
251b8(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis pa sdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ 'di bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa

252a2(mdo 'grel): bzod pa bsol zhing 'thab krol bgyid pa de yang spong ste/ de'i slad du dge slong dmar ser can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sa bajigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags la bzod pa mdzad na/ 
252a3(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod 
252a4(mdo 'grel): pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs 
252a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bzod pa mdzad lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong dge ldan 
252a6(mdo 'grel): ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de/ 'di la dge 'dun gyis spo ba dang / gzhi gnas spo ba dang / mgu bar bgyi ba dang / gzhi gnas mgu bar bgyi ba rtsol ba 
252a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'byin pa mdzad pas lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton bgyi ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bgyi ba dang / nang du sems ni gnas su bgyi bshor na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi 
252a8(mdo 'grel): dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dag ldan lung brdzun du bgyid pa la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun

257a6(mdo 'grel): mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod par gsol zhing lhung ba de yang ma mthong ngo zhes mchis pas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin 
257a7(mdo 'grel): las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag dang dge slong 'dun ba ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dpung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag/

273b8(mdo 'grel): gal te dge 'dun gyi dus labab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshal du stsol to// 
274a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'cha ka'adi dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'gro ba yang mchid 
274a2(mdo 'grel): kyis mi 'tshal/ 'greng ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/ nyal ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan 
274a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par stsal 
274a4(mdo 'grel): bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis 
274a5(mdo 'grel): su la lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong 'char ka 'di ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba/ swa 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar 
274a6(mdo 'grel): bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu skol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar bsten la mtshams kyis nang du mchis te/ bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las smad dbab pa'i phrin 
274a7(mdo 'grel): las mdzad pa'i gzhi las slar ldog na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad du gsol 
274b1(mdo 'grel): lan ga sum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshal du stsal ba'ang skra 'greng bar gyur/ sa 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la gru stsol ba
274b2(mdo 'grel): bgyid/ 'byung bar baspyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing / gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de slang ldag na 
274b3(mdo 'grel): gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis cha dang ldan pa 'chang ka de'ang bo nyid tshatshol du sul ba la bzod pa mdzad do// 'don 
274b4(mdo 'grel): gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba 'di sgra 'greng bar gyur/ sgra 'byung bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu stsol 
274b5(mdo 'grel): bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bstod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing / gzhi gang las smad bab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog

274b7(mdo 'grel): gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'don las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dgra 
274b8(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka de'ang ba nyid tshal du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol
275a1(mdo 'grel): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pas/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 
275a2(mdo 'grel): ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo

279b5(mdo 'grel): 'di dge 'dun gyis gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas 
279b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis na sa mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis gau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa su la lags pas/ kau shAm+bi pa'i dge 
279b7(mdo 'grel): slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa gsol ba 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dusal bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 
279b8(mdo 'grel): gyis ko shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal pa la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnam sa gsan du gsol/ kau shA m+bI pa'i 
280a1(mdo 'grel): dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'dil 
280a2(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAn+ti/ 
280a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa bstsal lags pas/ kau shA m+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun 
280a4(mdo 'grel): gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun bstsal ba mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun bstsal pa la mthun 
280a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i gso sbyong stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du 
280a6(mdo 'grel): bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// 
280a7(mdo 'grel): las bya ba'i gzhi'o// / tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/ bdag cag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 
280a8(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'o ma 'thung ste/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhad las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan 
280b1(mdo 'grel): tsha za ste/ bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khra ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gos dras pa gyon te/ bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o// 
280b2(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chus zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/ bdag cag gis thong du gnas par 
280b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba yongs su ma spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag 
280b4(mdo 'grel): gis dag pa dang grol ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 'dzin pa des dge sbyong gau ta ma las ring du gyis shig/ so sor gyis shig/ tha dad du 
280b5(mdo 'grel): gyis shig/ rgyang bsrings shig/ zag bsrings shig/ logs shig tu 'dug cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/ bdag cag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o// 
280b6(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'o ma 'thung ste/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 
280b7(mdo 'grel): las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro// dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/ bdag gis bza' bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 
280b8(mdo 'grel): gos dras pa gyon te/ bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chus zos pa 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dkon pa na 
281a1(mdo 'grel): gnas par byed de/ bdag cag ni grong du gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba yongs su ma spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 
281a2(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang / grol ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 
281a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa des tshul shing long zhig/ 'khor lo bye ba'i gzhi'o// // rtsod pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang // dge 'dun bsnyed gsum gnas brtan dang // 
281a4(mdo 'grel): 'dri ma dang dran dang ma smos dang // khyed dang de dag bdag 'dun bshags// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par 
281a5(mdo 'grel): zhi bar byed par spro'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 
281a6(mdo 'grel): 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes 
281a7(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bgyi ste/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas rtsod pa rnam par
281a8(mdo 'grel): zhi bar bgyid do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid par 
281b1(mdo 'grel): spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spron/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi brtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid/

282a1(mdo 'grel): bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi

282b4(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun btsun pa rnamasags na du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis meng 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod 
282b5(mdo 'grel): pa sbed par bskon/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/

282b7(mdo 'grel): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas ga ge mo zhes bgyi bar gang zag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang / mi dag ge mo zhes bgyi ba la sa gzhi 'di'i slad du byung 
282b8(mdo 'grel): nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi par bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun
283a1(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag brkos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar

283a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na/ gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul na dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma 
283a8(mdo 'grel): thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag brkos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong bsal ba'i 
283b1(mdo 'grel): yang gsal ba dag bskos na dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las gsal ba rnams kyis dge/

283b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dang sal dbul lo// mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla ba

284b7(mdo 'grel): 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol// 
284b8(mdo 'grel): lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gso ba gsog rdzun gyis skur 
285a1(mdo 'grel): te/ 'di la dge slong dag gis gni des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na

285a5(mdo 'grel): dran pas 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan

285a8(mdo 'grel): tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad cing smras te brtsal nas mig gyur/ kha chu zags 
285b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres ldog/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log paltar bcos/ ma smyos kyang myos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ bdag gis 
285b2(mdo 'grel): dran pa rnyed na bdag la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas bdag dge slong bye ma skyes dge 'dun la ma skyes pas 'dul ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams 
285b3(mdo 'grel): kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong bye ma skyes lam smyos pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong 
285b4(mdo 'grel): bya ma skyes spros pa sems 'khrugs pa thug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa rjes su mthun pa lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang 
285b5(mdo 'grel): mthun pa ma legs pa/ mang du spyad cing glu ste/ brtsal nas mig gyur/ kha chu zags bzhin bsgyur/ sal 'dres ldog/ gnyis kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log paltar 
285b6(mdo 'grel): bcos/ ma spyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ 'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge slong rnams kyi sa gzhi des gleng bas dge slong bye ma skyes 'di dag 
285b7(mdo 'grel): 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma 
285b8(mdo 'grel): smyos pas 'dul bstsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor rabs

291b6(mdo 'grel): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su
291b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong med 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni 
291b8(mdo 'grel): gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyis mdzes 'chos su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang me gsu 
292a1(mdo 'grel): bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// sder spyad brims pa dang / gnas mal 'bog pa dang / gnas mal byi bo 'bog pa dang / shing tog brims pa dang 
292a2(mdo 'grel): chu'i zhal nya pa dang / bang rim gyi zhal ta pa dang / khye'u chung srung ba dang / sra bkyang sbed pa dang ni las snga ma dag gis khongs su 'dus so// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod lag gi blar spro 
292a3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ spro'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blang spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun

292b1(mdo 'grel): nyams chung la bra 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i gnang ba gsol na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
292b2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa las/ 'khar ba'i gnang ba sul du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du

292b4(mdo 'grel): dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod/

293a7(mdo 'grel): yang 'di zhes bgyi brgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la zo 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal to// 'din gsol ba'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/

293b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka'i khongs su 'dus so// gnas mal gyig ni dang nye ba'i gzhi'o// / las kyi grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu nges pa dag las shes she na/ gtam gyi gni las las kyis grangs

293b8(mdo 'grel): bdun no// gsol ba dang bzhi'i las ni sum du'o zhes gsungs so// de las gsol ba'i las nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ gsang sa ston pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams 
294a1(mdo 'grel): gsang ste dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams dge 'dun gyi nang du dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig 
294a2(mdo 'grel): gi las bya ba dang / so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gso sbyong de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las

296b7(mdo 'grel): 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / de dag la bzod pa bya ba la sogs pa dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gso sbyong bzhag

297a1(mdo 'grel): dang / gzhi nas spob sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang bzhi nas bslang stes 
297a2(mdo 'grel): ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma las dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i 
297a3(mdo 'grel): las bya ba dang / sra brkyang dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / ma spyos pas 'dul ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang 
297a4(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / 
297a5(mdo 'grel): dede'i rjes su phyogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / khyim sun 'byin pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / bka' blo mi bde ba 
297a6(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong dang dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang 
297a7(mdo 'grel): gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong ma bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma dkon mchog gtong ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba 
297a8(mdo 'grel): dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma 'thab krol byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnas pa zlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhin 
297b1(mdo 'grel): las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnas su 'dzud pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las b+hA ba dang / dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bsnyil ba la gsol ba dang 
297b2(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i las bya ba dang / pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ba la bslab pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba'o// las rnams kyi bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di dag yin te/ gsang dang
297b3(mdo 'grel): nang du dri phyir dang / gso sbyong de la ltung bcas dang // de la dge 'dun yid gnyis dang // rtsod dang nges nyid ma yin dang / de yi don du lnga po dag/ thams cad dgag dbyer gtogs pa yin// 
297b4(mdo 'grel): dbyar gnas khas blang nyid dang ni// shi ba'i rdzas dang nor 'dra dang // chos gos sra brkyang gtad pa dang // chos gos sbyin par bya ba dang // gan sa ngan len ni brjod pa dang // grangs su gzhug pa 
297b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi dag dang // khyim gyi sdom dang de gzhig dang // lhung bzed khas dbub bya ba dang // de nyid bzlog par bya ba dag/ gsol ba 'ba' zhig las yin no// gnas dang mtshams ni gsum po dang // mi 'bral 
297b6(mdo 'grel): spyos dang dgag dbye dang // gnas mal stobs par byed pa dang // rung bas sa gzhi bsgo ba dang // sra brkyang dang ni de 'ding dang // spong dang lag gi bla dang ni// gnas khung bsko la sogs pa dang // 
297b7(mdo 'grel): gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang // tshul shing brims par byed pa dang // khang pa khang chen bstan pa dang // gleng dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur dang // stan dang lhung bzed brims pa dang // ma dad 
297b8(mdo 'grel): go bar bya ba dang // ston pa dang ni nags nyul dang // phyag mi bya dang mang phyir dang // 'khang pa dra ba'i phyir dang ni// rnyed pa gcig tu bya phyir dang // bslab pa sbyin dang nyer gnas dang / 
298a1(mdo 'grel): bu dang nye du'i phyir 'gro ba// gsol dang gnyis kyi las yin no// bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba dang // mu stegs gnas dang mtshams dgrol dang // mthun sbyin 
298a2(mdo 'grel): gso sbyong bdun po dag/ brgyad dang dran dang ma spyos dang // de nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang // bsko bar bya ba rnams dang ni// nyams pa sbyin par bya ba dag/ gsol ba dang bzhin 
298a3(mdo 'grel): las yin no// las brgya rtsa gcig pa/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po bram ze'i btsun pa slob dpon yon tan 'od bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i 
298a4(mdo 'grel): mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba bdud rtsi'i nying khrus shes rab kyi dbang po rgyas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dam pa nan tan snying por 
298a5(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs pas/ sde pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi gtso bo gyur pa/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba kun las btus pa rdzogs so// / 
298a6(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lhab can po'i bka' lung gis/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra 
298a7(mdo 'grel): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba brje klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bskur cing nus te gtan la phab pa// 'di la sh+lo ka ni sum stang bdun brgya yod/ 
298a8(mdo 'grel): bam po ni dgur byas so// // mang+ga la//
